speaker: Customer
text: You have reached the voicemail of John Smith. Please leave a message after the beep.

speaker: Agent
text: Hello John, this is Lisa from Stellar Collections. I am calling about your overdue balance.

speaker: Customer
text: To leave a message, please include your name and number.

speaker: Agent
text: It's important to discuss your options for the account. You can reach me at 1-800-555-0199.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for your message. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
